title: Computer Network Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: TCP/IP fundamentals, OSI 7-layer model comprehension, and office network management experience
context.additional_context: Workplace-centered training for professionals, emphasizing CCNA certification preparation and practical problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can configure small-scale office networks using actual network topology design tools
Learners can diagnose network latency issues within three steps using packet tracing tools
Learners can propose departmental network segmentation solutions through VLAN configuration practice
In team projects, learners present traffic management solutions through SDN (Software-Defined Networking) simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
